member.name: T:CodeBase2.XmlExtensions
member.summary: Extensions using Reflection and Xml

member.name: M:CodeBase2.XmlExtensions.LoadClassPropertiesFromXML(System.Xml.XmlNode,System.Object)
member.summary: If one uses the XMLPropertyAttribute to designate attribute names in Xml of class properties, this will set the values from Xml to the class properties, if the property type is an enum, string or int. This will work set public and nonpublic properties (it can break encapsulation). Inherited properties cannot be set if the set method of the property is private, it must be at least protected.
